document.full_text: italy's lower house of parliament voted wednesday to cut the length of some criminal trials, approving a measure that is likely to end prime minister silvio berlusconi's trial for bribing his lawyer david mills.
document.title: italian lower house votes to cut berlusconi trial
lines_and_colors: italy's lower house of parliament voted wednesday to cut the length of some criminal trials, approving a measure that is likely to end prime minister silvio berlusconi's trial for bribing his lawyer david mills.
